step.tex: \dfrac{\sin A\cdot\cos B - \cos A\cdot\sin B}{\cos A\sin B} \\ \quad\,+\dfrac{\sin B\cdot\cos C-\cos B\cdot\sin C}{\cos B\cos C} \\ \quad\,+\dfrac{\sin C\cdot\cos A-\cos C\cdot\sin A}{\cos C\cos A} \\

\dfrac{\sin A\cdot\cos B + \cos A\cdot\sin B}{\cos A\sin B} \\ \quad\,+\dfrac{\sin B\cdot\cos C+\cos B\cdot\sin C}{\cos B\cos C} \\ \quad\,+\dfrac{\sin C\cdot\cos A+\cos C\cdot\sin A}{\cos C\cos A} \\
step.reason: \sin(X-Y)=\sin X\cos Y-\cos X\sin Y \\ \therefore\dfrac{\sin(A-B)}{\cos A\cos B}+\dfrac{\sin(B-C)}{\cos B\cos C} +\dfrac{\sin(C-A)}{\cos C\cos A} \\ \quad=\dfrac{\sin A\cdot\cos B - \cos A\cdot\sin B}{\cos A\sin B} \\ \quad\,+\dfrac{\sin B\cdot\cos C-\cos B\cdot\sin C}{\cos B\cos C} \\ \quad\,+\dfrac{\sin C\cdot\cos A-\cos C\cdot\sin A}{\cos C\cos A} \\

step.context: \text{Can the result from the previous step be} \\ \text{reduced to this?}
step.reason: \left(\dfrac{\sin A}{\cos A}-\dfrac{\sin B}{\cos B}\right) +\left(\dfrac{\sin B}{\cos B}-\dfrac{\sin C}{\cos C}\right) \\ \quad+\left(\dfrac{\sin C}{\cos C}-\dfrac{\sin A}{\cos A}\right) \\ =\left(\tan A-\tan B\right)+\left(\tan B-\tan C\right) \\ \quad+\left(\tan C-\tan A\right) \\ =0
